file_content.text: When we return home, we will send you whatever help we can.
He's dead? You--how could you... he seemed invincible.
Why would he do this? Tobas Grell said Blaesus was your ally.
These Children of the Emperor seem intent on destroying the Rift Alliance and thereby the Republic.
The First Son's order, maybe.
I intend to find out before these Children of the Emperor do any more damage.
I will find the truth of this.
Blaesus's only allies were the other Children of the Emperor.
Clearly, he wasn't.
Forgive us, we had to give in to him. Clearly this Empire is too powerful; millions of our people could have died at his whim.
I won't condemn you for trying to save innocent lives.
I forgive you.
I see we're not fully informed about your reputation.
We are all forced to make choices in the moment, and you submitted to evil.
It was still wrong.
I apologize. Your Republic is new to us.
I expect compensation!
Yes, absolutely, you'll receive reparations. I swear it.
Our troops died because of his treachery. They were so proud--they would have served your Republic well.
No one can change the past. We can only learn from it.
We must move on, past regret.
This has been a hard lesson for us, Jedi. Give us time.
Your soldiers died nobly, trying to protect you.
They were heroes.
Considering Blaesus cut them down in droves, your planet's soldiers are clearly of little use.
Not if they died so easily.
Doesn't the Republic teach compassion!
Peace, Nyscha, perhaps it's some Jedi custom.
I hope Tobas Grell and little Nadia are alright. We owe them so much.
Senator Grell and his daughter have earned their place on my ship. I'll take care of them.
As do I.
I'm more concerned about you.
Personally, I'd toss Grell and his daughter ashore somewhere, but the Jedi Council might object.
They're irritating as ever.
We will ask the Republic for help getting home.
Whatever your reasons for saving us, the Republic will receive a large donation for this.
I will never forget how you came to our rescue. From now on, the Republic will have full access to our treasury.
If you are being targeted, there may be further attacks.
You could still be at risk.
You're kind to be so concerned, but we will be safe at home.
A kind gesture.
That's all you can offer?
We've just lost the cream of our troops, Jedi. We can't offer more, not yet.
Goodbye, Jedi. Go safely.
